article_text:
I’m back for a 13th year covering CMS

Who knew so much could change in one year?

Student assignment, charters and leadership loom large

article_metadata.title: After a year away, critical issues for CMS are easy to spot | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: When I took on a one-year assignment covering the Affordable Care Act last summer, I knew I was plunging into a new challenge.
og.title: After a year away, critical issues for CMS are easy to spot
